pkgmetadata.longdescription: # RFK101 PackagePackage to connect to Lutron Homeworks Series-4 and Series-8 systems.The controller is connected by an RS232 port to an Ethernet adaptor (NPort).# Example: from time import sleep from pyhomeworks import Homeworks def callback(msg,data): print(msg,data) hw = Homeworks( 'host.test.com', 4008, callback ) # Sleep for 10 seconds waiting for a callback sleep(10.) # Close the interface hw.close()
